summary: This project currently adds 15 new, Lore-Friendly students to the college of Winterhold in an attempt to make it look more lively
descriptionHtml:
This project currently adds 15 new, Lore-Friendly students to the college of Winterhold in an attempt to make it look more lively. This is in very early stages and I eventually hope to add quests to each NPC, Fully Voiced. (No Voices or quests Yet)

If you do not have the skimpy armour mod the clothing will not look like that on the females so if you want it to look more Lore-Friendly don't worry, it will look just like the vanilla robes.

This Requires no DLC or other mod, I may in the future and an Alternative hair mod as an option but it will not be required.

I believe some of the students still won't follow, I'll look into what is causing this shortly so sorry if someone won't follow you ):

I have added a lot of different races for a bit of variety currently including:
2 Argonians- Male and Female
1 Khajiit- Female
2 Orcs- Male and Female
1 Breton- Male
1 Nord- Female
1 Imperial- Female
2 Dunmer- Male and Female
2 Altmer- Male and Female
2 Bosmer- Male and female
1 Redguard- Male
(I think cx)

You can find them in the Hall of Attainment, Elements and Archaenium

Don't clean this mod in TES5Edit! When I tried all NPC's disappeared.

Please help support this mod, it is only going to get better and endorse if you like it and please track, thank you for downloading :)

To-do list:
Fix face colour-Done-
Fix unnecessary edits-Done-
Finish modelling NPCs- All but teachers-
Make Students Followers-Done-
Create back stories-50% Complete-
Write dialogue
Teachers offer skill leveling
Begin Scripting:
Some examples:
more students for saarthal quest
Students casting spells in hall of elements
Teachers teaching classes (fully voiced)
Move students during eye of magnus quest and help defend winterhold

Extend the college for classrooms and lectures
Be able to attend classed which teach you new spells (possibly new spells?)

This is going to take me and my friend a long time, if you would like to help on this project please let us know and we will let you help or voice act, what ever you can do would be of great help!
author: BleakKhajiit
